results.title: The Gulf between
results.brief_description: Fired from 1000 kilometers away, 39 scud missiles hit Israel during the Gulf War. Two people died as a result of direct hits. Twelve people died from related causes. Thousands of buildings were destroyed. For Israelis the impact of this war spread far beyond this… This documentary uncovers the personal feelings and stories of six ordinary Israelis as they reflect on their experiences during the Gulf War and their belief in the hatred towards Israel by the surrounding Arab States. It would appear that most Israelis want peace but do not agree on how to achieve this end - resigned to the fact that perhaps co-existence with the Palestinians is the only way. However, the Israelis have lived through many wars: War of Independence (1948); Suez crisis (1956); Six Day War (1967); Yom Kippur War (1973); Lebanon War (1982); and are determined not to back down from their fight to keep Israel as the rightful home for Jewish people. Contains strong images of the aftermath of the Gulf War, archival footage of the Holocaust and interviews.

results.title: The Grudge 2 = Ju-on 2
results.creator_credit: Takashi Shimizu, Takashige Ichise, Nikkatsu Kabushiki Kaisha and Kadokawa Shoten Publishing Company
results.brief_description: In this sequel to “The Grudge”, a Tokyo house has been the site of many strange disappearances. A television crew go to investigate the site, setting off a spate of killings by the evil spirit that dwells there. Although not as well received as “The Grudge” this horror film contains a convoluted narrative, but contains exemplary scares and thrills, fitting for the genre, with a chilling finale. Cast includes: Noriko Sakai, Chiharu Niiyama and Kei Horie.

results.title: Evensong cinema slide
results.creator_credit: Gaumont British Picture Corporation and Victor Saville
results.credit_line: ACMI has endeavoured to contact the owners of these objects since their deposit in 2015. Unfortunately this has been unsuccessful. We would welcome any information to identify the owners.
results.brief_description:
Two glass sheets: one glass only and the other with slide imagery which has a monochromatic emulsion that has then been hand painted with coloured pigments or dye.
TEXT on the slide reads: Evelyn Laye in Evensong with Fritz Kortner Alice Delysia
The two sheets of glass are held together using Gunn’s Slide branded tape: Gunn’s Slide, 9 Collins Place Melb. Cent. 2736.
On the clear glass slide there are remnants of handwritten detail which has nearly all worn off. It possibly says: STARTS..

results.title: The Grudge = Ju-on (2003)
results.creator_credit: Takashi Shimizu, Takashige Ichise, Nikkatsu Kabushiki Kaisha and Aozora Investment
results.brief_description: Suitably scary J-horror that draws appealingly on the tropes of the genre with disgruntled spirits rising to haunt the terrified living. When a young social worker helps out an elderly woman, she finds a young boy residing in a spooky house. Each investigating person becomes troubled by menacing spirits, until a detective attempts to destroy the house. Aping the very successful style of “The Ring” (Hideo Nakata, 1998), Takashi Shimizu engages in elliptical narrative threads, whilst providing requisite scares and thrills. This film is a big-screen re-working of “Ju-on” and “Ju-on 2” two low budget Shimizu films. Cast includes: Megumi Okina, Misaki Ito, Kanji Tsuda, Shuri Matsuda, and Misa Uehara.

results.title: The Great escape
results.creator_credit: Allen Martin, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
results.brief_description: “That day the Americans gave us a fruit cake was a very rare day indeed, as breaks were not on the cards”. A near-miss while relaxing in Tambu Bay, New Guinea right near the end of the war was a turning point in more ways than one. The senselessness of war drove Allen to find his own happiness and sense of meaning when he returned to civilian life.

results.title: Time to fly
results.creator_credit: Liam O'Bree, Belle Willox and ACMI
results.brief_description: Belle Willox joined the WAAAFs because she always wanted to be a flyer like Amy Johnson. She joined when she was 18 and, though she never got to pilot a plane herself, there were certainly many ups and downs during her time in the war.

results.title: The Sky is gray
results.creator_credit: Stan Lathan, Whitney Green and Perspective Films
results.brief_description:
Episode of Series “The American Short Story”.
Based on a short story by Ernest Gaines. Deals with a young black farmboy’s visit to the dentist in a small Louisiana town in the 1940’s. The visit marks the dawning of his social and self-awareness. Commentary by Henry Fonda. Cast: Olivia Cole, James Bond III.

results.title: The Boarded window
results.brief_description:
Episode of Series “The American Short Story”.
This film is based on the famous horror story by Ambrose Bierce. It tells of a hunter whose young wife dies of fever. Her grief stricken husband prepares her body for burial, but during the night the forces of nature intervene to create a horrific and macabre ending. Restricted : postprimary schools only.
